thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Rudolph Technologies Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rudolph Technologies Reports Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.03
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Rudolph Technologies Inc:
* RUDOLPH TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.03 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11 PERCENT TO $60.1 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 TO $0.45 * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.32 TO $0.50 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $64 MILLION TO $74 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.31, REVENUE VIEW $66.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
